title: Rarotonga: Palm Grove
inclusions_evidence: Includes 5 nights at Palm Grove; Return airport transfers; Tropical breakfast daily; Use of guest BBQ, kayaks, snorkel equipment, beach chairs, and beach towels; Bonus Stay an additional two nights for the price of one

items.label: Use of guest BBQ, kayaks, snorkel equipment, beach chairs, and beach towels
Bonus: stay 2 nights for the price of 1 (promotion)

other.notes: No independent supplier or OTA prices were retrieved for hotel, transfers or extras. External price checks on booking.com/expedia/supplier sites required to compute DIY total.

reasoning: Flights are not included (page states these are 'land only' deals). The package includes 5 nights, return transfers and daily breakfast plus free use of kayaks/snorkel gear and a promotional bonus of 2-for-1 nights — these inclusions increase on-site value. However, no independent OTA or supplier prices were obtained to compute a DIY comparison, so savings cannot be calculated. Based on the inclusions and a total of 1666 for two (833pp) this appears to be a good mid-to-strong value for a short Rarotonga stay if hotel rates plus transfers would exceed 1666 for two, but verification is required.
additional_notes: Deal text notes family pricing and extra night rates; promotion validity shown in excerpt (example: 'valid for travel 01 Nov 25 - 31 Mar 26'). Researcher should fetch room-rate (room for 2 adults) on booking platforms and flight costs for the traveler's origin to determine exact DIY total.
